description: Complete system overview documenting the hierarchical agent architecture, core components, and high-level data flow between systems
Detailed documentation of the agent delegation system, including role hierarchies, task routing algorithms, and inter-agent communication patterns
Comprehensive documentation of the vector database implementation, semantic search algorithms, embedding processes, and conversation context management
Detailed documentation of the privacy-aware Gmail/Calendar integration, including authentication flows, data access patterns, and security measures
Detailed data flow documentation showing how information moves between agents, memory systems, and external integrations, including sequence diagrams for key operations
